english.segment1: Lord, You promised if I keep my mind on You, You'd keep me in perfect peace
english.segment2: Choir. (Yes you would, you'd keep me in perfect peace)
english.segment3: With a sincere heart if I called upon Your name. You'd never turn away from me
english.segment4: Choir. (No, no you'd never turn away from me)
english.segment5: Said you'd give me everything I need
english.segment6: Choir. (You'd give me everything i need)
english.segment7: I came for deliverance. Deliverance I'll receive. You said You'd deliver me. And that's what I believe
english.segment8: So now every promise is mine, Lord (It's mine). I claim it (Oh yes, I know It's mine). By faith I receive it it's mine (It's mine). Won't leave here like I came ; I'm never gonna be the same. I know (It's mine). By faith I believe I believe (Oh yes, I know It's mine). Reach out and receive now (It's mine). Won't leave here like I came; I'm never gonna be the same. You can be saved just say
english.segment9: I came for salvation, Lord. Salvation I'll receive. You said You would save me, Lord. And that's what I believe
english.segment10: I came just to hear Your word. Your word will I receive. You said You world send Your word. And that's what I believe
english.segment11: So down in my heart I know (It's mine). I do believe it ( Oh, yes. I know it's mine). I heard all your promises (it's mine). Won't leave here like I came; I'm never gonna be the same. I know, I know (It's mine)
english.segment12: Healing (Oh, yes. I know it's mine). The provision for me (It's mine). Won't leave here like I came; I'm never gonna be the same. Yes (It's mine). You need to know (Oh yes. I know It's mine). Believe all the promises (It's Mine). Won't leave here like I came; I'm never gonna be the same
english.segment13: Somebody help me say (It's mine). Come on and help me say (Oh yes. I know it's mine). Somebody help me say (It's mine)
english.segment14: I came for your healings Lord. Your healings I'll recieve. You said you would heal me Lord. And that's what I believe
english.segment15: I came for deliverance. Deliverance I'll recieve. You said you would deliver me. And that's what I believe. (I believe, I believe). And that's what I believe. (I believe, I recieve). And that's what I believe. (Lord I look down no doubt I no). And that's what I believe. (That's what I believe). And that's what I believe
